text:
Political parties should submit their applications seeking permission for organising public meetings and processions for the election, at least 48 hours in advance.

In a release issued here on Wednesday, K. Nandakumar, District Collector, said that an exclusive counter with single window system had been set up at the Collectorate premises for this purpose. Procedure for submitting applications would be explained at an all-party meeting to be convened on March 14.

Public meetings and other propaganda rallies should be organised within seven days from the date of submission of applications, the release added.
title: Permission for meetings
